mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posted_comments(daily_post_id, comment, register_user_id, register_date, update_user_id, update_date, version, status) VALUES(#{dailyPostId}, #{comment}, #{registerUserId}, #{registerDate}, #{updateUserId}, #{updateDate}, #{version}, #{status} );
mapper.update: UPDATE posted_comments SET comment = #{comment}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId}, update_date = #{updateDate}, version = version + 1 where daily_post_id = #{dailyPostId}
mapper.select: UPDATE posted_comments SET update_user_id = #{updateUserId}, update_date = #{updateDate}, version = #{version}, status=#{status} where daily_post_id = #{dailyPostId}
